pages.title: About
pages.text: Sweet, now it works!Our online content and identities are becoming more important and sometimes even critical to our lives. Neither are secure in the hands of random ephemeral startups or big silos. We should be the holders of our online presence.

pages.title: Tools
pages.text: ProblemsThe number of methods and techniques that should help in innovation process & product development is overhelming.Some information is available online, some offline in books and difficult to acceessSolutionA collection of techniques which are mainstream collected and presented in one placesaves timeorganizes knowledgehelps to explain to other

posts.title: asteroidos.org
posts.text: The good product needs a good website. Especially a hack product that delivers completely new services to the user.After a few months of work spent on improving and developing new features for the asteroidOS operating system and just beforethe alpha release the need for a new website, with great usr experience was bigger than ever!Quick StartWelcome to Hexo! posts.title: Ping Pong Town
posts.text: Ping Pong Town is a free and open-source community app deesigned & developed by small team at SPICED Academy Bootcamp. It is a web-based application build with React, Google Maps and node.js. Current version is successfuly reach “working prototype” status.FunctionalityUse CasesFind public ping pong tables around the cityCheck the availability of the table; join or check into the tableAdd new spots with exacts location, image and descriptionFind about about ping-pong events around meParticipate in events, contests, collect points and be highest in the ranking!Communicate with others to meet people and have fun with themMVPUser profilesInteractive map with check in funtionalityGallery page and data base with a list of known ping pong tablesClub page connect with the user profile with events list and score boardClickable prototypeWorkflowCode1$ hexo serverMore info: PingPong Town RepoCollaboration - Retrospectives
